segment.source: Rollout phases for Microsoft Intune deployment
segment.target: Rollout phases for Microsoft Intune deployment

segment.source: Rollout phases for Microsoft Intune deployment
segment.target: Rollout phases for Microsoft Intune deployment

segment.source: This topic describes the phases that are generally associated with a service deployment.
segment.target: This topic describes the phases that are generally associated with a service deployment.

segment.source: The typical phases of a technical deployment are Project Scope, Proof of Concept, Pilot, Enterprise rollout, and Run State.
segment.target: The typical phases of a technical deployment are Project Scope, Proof of Concept, Pilot, Enterprise rollout, and Run State.

segment.source: These are defined briefly here, with links to more information and recommendations about how to proceed through each phrase.
segment.target: These are defined briefly here, with links to more information and recommendations about how to proceed through each phrase.

segment.source: Project scope: Understand goals, deployment, and rollout strategy.
segment.target: Project scope: Understand goals, deployment, and rollout strategy.

segment.source: Proof of concept: Test technical deployment & network architecture.
segment.target: Proof of concept: Test technical deployment & network architecture.

segment.source: Pilot: With a sample of enrolled devices, validate scenarios, resources, and rollout plans with user in preparation for broad rollout.
segment.target: Pilot: With a sample of enrolled devices, validate scenarios, resources, and rollout plans with user in preparation for broad rollout.

segment.source: Enterprise rollout: Launch across all departments and user groups.
segment.target: Enterprise rollout: Launch across all departments and user groups.

segment.source: Run state: Operations plan for all key phases/focus areas, increase user-adoption.
segment.target: Run state: Operations plan for all key phases/focus areas, increase user-adoption.
